channel.title: Connecting to update server-help?!
channel.description: im using tokkul scape 508 v3.5 source and server, all compiles good, and all paths are perfect, but when i open the run.bat for the client, it opens, and says *connecting to update server" i really dont want it to do this, because it instantly causes it to crash [code]error_game_js5connect[/code] how can i stop the client trying to reach the update server?

item.title: Connecting to update server-help?!
item.dc:creator: @helloimwhite helloimwhite
item.description:
@helloimwhite wrote:

thanks guys:) but just a lil late lol, fixed, i had to search all the files for starter ip’s, they were set to “###.#.#.#” had to notepad++ them all and change it to the local ip :)… thanks tho:p

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to update server-help?!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Did you change all of your ips to 127.0.0.1? Or if you’re hosting, your server isn’t online.

Read full topic
